name: Emojis Find the Pairs Learning & memo Game
name_original: Emojis Find the Pairs Learning & memo Game
description:
"Download for free Memory Game: emojis to improve your children´s memory skills as they have fun playing this game. A free educational game to entertain kids of all ages, from babies to preschool children, or even older kids who attend elementary school and adults as well.
Playing with this memory game is very easy: cards are presented upside down; you have to turn one card over, memorize the picture and look for the same picture to turn the same card over. If two cards match, they'll remain flipped over and you'll be able to keep searching other pairs. If the cards don't match, they are turned back over and you'll have another turn. You have to be very fast because time passes quickly! This app has seven difficulty levels available: 2x2, 3x2, 4x3, 4x4, 5x4, 6x5 and 6x6.
We've designed this app as an educational tool. This game is perfect to develop children´s concentration and motor skills. Kid memory is always developing, so to stimulate children let them play this very interesting game so that in a future, they can have benefits from a good memory. You'll help your children improving their memory skills with these lovely pictures of emojis that we've especially designed for this app."
